block.p: INTERNATIONAL LEAGUE CHARLOTTE KNIGHTS--Signed C Dave Toth. Sent C Brandon Hyde to Winston-Salem of the Carolina League.
NATIONAL BASKETBALL ASSOCIATION NBA--Named Bernie Mullin senior vice president of team marketing and business operations.
INTERNATIONAL LEAGUE CHARLOTTE KNIGHTS--Signed C Dave Toth. Sent C Brandon Hyde to Winston-Salem of the Carolina League.
NATIONAL BASKETBALL ASSOCIATION NBA--Named Bernie Mullin senior vice president of team marketing and business operations.

UNITED STATES BASKETBALL LEAGUE ATLANTIC CITY SEAGULLS--Released F-C Charles Macon. Placed F Deon Jackson on the inactive list. Signed C Darius Beard. BROOKLYN KINGS--Released F Jason Wallace. GULF COAST SUNDOGS--Activated F Howard Porter and C Derek Chandler. Named Brian Newberry equipment manager. LONG ISLAND SURF--Activated F Tariq Kirksay. Placed Darren DeSchryver on the inactive list. Signed F Jacksi Robinson.

NATIONAL FOOTBALL LEAGUE HOUSTON--Named Ralph Hawkins college scout. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Fired Bobby Grier, vice president of player personnel, and Dave Uyrus, national scout. NEW YORK JETS--Signed WR Laveranues Coles, G Semisi Heimuli, DT Dan Gibbons and FB Brent Naccara. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Signed LB Seth Joyner and RB Keith Byars.
CALIFORNIA--Named Kevin Grimes men's soccer coach. MANHATTAN--Named Travis Lyons men's assistant basketball coach. RIDER--Named John Hangey assistant wrestling coach.
